general.comment: specify a path on where to put the template after download
By default set to the home directory of the user
MANDOTORY, if not set as -template_path / template_files in command line
if not set, template_name will be used by default
Template used for crop_aladin / projection in stereo space

use_T2.comment: boolean marker, if present T2 and T1 are exchanged in the process, (T2 is used to register to template, and T1 is registered to T2)
BE CAREFUL, the name of the internal nodes are still using the original names although the files are swapped
Everything is swapped back as outputs of short_preparation_pipe

aladin_T2_on_T1.comment: boolean marker, if present RegAladin to coregister T2 on T1 and pad/resample, otherwise use FSL FLIRT (default)

crop_T1.comment: if present, applied to both T1w and T2w

inv_transfo_aladin.comment: not sure why it is parameterized

pad_template.comment: used for skullTo3d to keep an image bigger than brain, but is not used further in brain segmentation
